name: MKTileOverlay
desc: An overlay that covers an area of the map with tiles of bitmap images.

items.name: init(urlTemplate: String?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a tile overlay object using the specified tile-access template.

items.name: var tileSize: CGSize
items.desc: The size (in pixels) of your tile images.

items.name: var isGeometryFlipped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the orientation of tile indexes along the y axis.

items.name: var minimumZ: Int
items.desc: The minimum zoom level supported by the tiles of this overlay object.

items.name: var maximumZ: Int
items.desc: The maximum zoom level supported by the tiles of this overlay object.

items.name: var canReplaceMapContent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the tile content is fully opaque.

items.name: var urlTemplate: String?
items.desc: The template for generating tile image URLs.

items.name: func url(forTilePath: MKTileOverlayPath) -> URL
items.desc: Returns the URL to use to access the specified tile.

items.name: func loadTile(at: MKTileOverlayPath, result: (Data?, Error?) -> Void)
struct MKTileOverlayPath
items.desc: Use this structure to specify the index values for a single tile.
